trial_steps.text:
Follow the steps below to redeem your free Bilingrok language partner service:

1. Register for an xAI account
2. Generate an API Key
3. Copy and paste the API Key into the chat for verification

Once verified, enjoy a 7-day free trial of Bilingrok! ğŸ‰ğŸ‰ğŸ‰

language_not_supported.text: Sorry, this language is not supported yet. Please try again!

native_language_value.text: Your language partner will help you create "notes" in {language_name} from your conversations. These notes will review, correct, and enhance vocabulary, phrases, or casual expressions!

practice_language.text:
Which language do you want to practice? (select below)

Your language partner will use the chosen language to practice with you!

match_language_partner.text:
Your Bilingrok language partner will chat with you in {target_language_name} to provide the best language practice environment.

Even better, the system will periodically create notes in {native_language_name} from your conversations to help you improve! ğŸŒŸ
